entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is leading a few of his favourite carols.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is booming more and more loudly with every goblet of eggnog he consumed.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy kept asking them all what they were sniggering at.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred had bewitched his prefect badge so that it now read ‘Pinhead’.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy was making loud, snide remarks about Harry's new jumper from the Slytherin table.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry didn’t even care that Draco Malfoy was making loud, snide remarks about his new jumper from the Slytherin table.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry and Ron had barely finished their third helpings of Christmas pudding.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione ushered them out of the Hall to finalise their plans for the evening.

entities.name: slytherin table
entities.description: The Slytherin table is mentioned as a location where Draco Malfoy was sitting.
